game_description: Fight your way through a fantasy world filled with magic and monsters, using your druidic dragon powers and sigils. Use physical motion to generate magic energy by punching spells, or slashing multiple enemies in your dragon form. Make the right tactical choices to balance your mana and energy levels, using your bow, magic and motion, combined with sigil and guardian cooldowns. Collect dragon eggs to obtain the power of all the guardian’s and gain strength, stamina and endurance as you progress through the mountains to defeat the crystal corrupted elementals. Fight your way through 4 difficulty levels to master the Dragon Druid’s abilities and become the ultimate protector of Gaia.
